stepAnswer: (1) the positive and negative thoughts people have about themselves, (2) how people rate their $$self-worth$$, and (3) evaluating their own abilities and personal characteristics
stepTitle: What are the three parts of self-esteem?
choices: (1) the positive and negative thoughts people have about themselves, (2) how people rate their $$self-worth$$, and (3) evaluating their own abilities and personal characteristics
